title: Badge Assertion Endorsement
description: An outside endorsement of a single awarded instance of a badge, pertaining solely to one earner.

endorsement.description: Collection of properties describing this endorsement.

badge.description: The URL of the badgeClass, as hosted on the issuer's site

uid.description: The locally unique (per-issuer) ID of the badge assertion to be endorsed.

endorserName.description: The name of the party or organization endorsing this badge instance.

endorserWebsite.description: URL of the website associated with the endorser.

endorserStatement.description: Statement from the endorser about their endorsement decision for this particular earner.

endorsementURL.description: URL of a page with more information about this endorsement

verify.description: Verification object containing the URL of the endorser's public key and a signature generated to match.

url.description: URL of the hosted public key on the endorser's domain.

signature.description: JSON Web Signature (header.payload.signature) tying the endorsement to the endorser via the endorser's key. use the endorsement object as a JSON string as the payload.
